scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modeules && npm i && npm run build
scripts.pub: git add . && git commit -m "Updates" && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.pack: npm version patch && npm run build && rm -f dist/* && cd dist && npm pack ../ && cd ../
scripts.share2auth: rm -f ../auth/local-packages/danieltalx-common*.tgz && cp -r dist/* ../auth/local-packages/ && cd ../auth && npm run local-packages
scripts.share2tickets: rm -f ../tickets/local-packages/danieltalx-common*.tgz && cp -r dist/* ../tickets/local-packages/ && cd ../tickets && npm run local-packages
scripts.share2orders: rm -f ../orders/local-packages/danieltalx-common*.tgz && cp -r dist/* ../orders/local-packages/ && cd ../orders && npm run local-packages
scripts.share2expiration: rm -f ../expiration/local-packages/danieltalx-common*.tgz && cp -r dist/* ../expiration/local-packages/ && cd ../expiration && npm run local-packages
scripts.share2payments: rm -f ../payments/local-packages/danieltalx-common*.tgz && cp -r dist/* ../payments/local-packages/ && cd ../payments && npm run local-packages
scripts.share2all: npm run share2auth && npm run share2tickets && npm run share2orders && npm run share2expiration && npm run share2payments
